channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vice President Vance Warns European Leaders that Mass Migration is the Most “Pressing Challenge”
item.description: Vice President Vance, in his first speech on a world stage, warned European leaders of the dangers of open borders and the urgent need for them to con...

item.title: Rep. Adrian Smith: US needs to be 'aggressive and effective' with tariffs
What Antitrust ‘Reformers’ Got Wrong
item.description: Lina Khan and her allies tried to remake antitrust law. Trump’s team is likely putting an end to that.

item.title: Fed union lobbies Hill, fighting Trump and for ‘dignity and respect’
item.description: Members of the second largest federal union lobbied Congress this week, promoting civil service protections and fighting mass firings.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: 7 things to watch for during Trump’s joint address to Congress
item.description: Look for a more emboldened president compared to the Trump of 2017.

item.title: Maine Schools are Failing While More Educational Resources are Devoted to Illegal Aliens
item.description: Policymakers in Maine have gone out of their way to make their state a magnet for illegal immigration. Along with that comes the challenge of trying t...

item.title: IRLI Attorney Testimony: Children of Illegal Aliens are Not Entitled to Birthright Citizenship
item.description: The automatic granting of U.S. citizenship to the children of illegal aliens not only rewards and encourages illegal migration but is at odds with bot...

item.title: Republicans quiet as DOGE slashes GOP-backed pro-democracy group
item.description: The International Republican Institute’s furloughed staffers feel betrayed by former board member Marco Rubio.

item.title: Putting Trump Administration Illegal Alien Arrests and Detainers in Context
item.description: The open-borders crowd argues that relatively low numbers of ICE arrests and detainers so far mean that the task of removing illegal aliens is too har...

item.title: ‘He Finally Shot the Hostage’: Trump’s Trade War Is a Brutal Reality Check
item.description: Trump imposing new tariffs on top of broader policy uncertainty will mean a hit to growth. The question is how large of a hit it will ultimately be.

item.title: DOGE staff bring U.S. Marshals to small federal agency that denied them access
item.description: The show of force by Trump administration officials and federal law enforcement resulted in a frantic and “traumatizing” scene, several USADF official...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: DOGE redefines ‘fraud’ to defend cutting federal employees, programs
item.description: Outside watchdogs and analysts say Trump and Musk are using overly broad claims of fraud to build political support for their plans.

item.title: Beijing’s deflation dilemma: Falling prices signal bigger troubles ahead for China’s economy
item.description: Such challenges are the backdrop to the annual session of China’s parliament.

item.title: There’s Nothing Noble about Boston’s Fight to Keep Sanctuary Policies
item.description: Sanctuary-supporting politicians in Boston are stepping up their defiance of Trump administration enforcement priorities, joining New York and Illinoi...

item.title: Judge orders USAID payments to some foreign aid groups by Monday
item.description: Judge Amir H. Ali set a noon Friday deadline for the Trump administration and aid organizations to clarify how much more the groups are owed.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.
